dialog.title: Import from D&D Beyond
dialog.pasteLabel: Paste Character Data from D&D Beyond Extension:
dialog.pastePlaceholder:
1. Go to your character page on D&D Beyond
2. Click 'Copy Character Data' button
3. Paste the data here
4. Click Import
dialog.note: If a character with the same name exists, it will be updated. Otherwise, a new character will be created.
